response.overview: Samuel Hernandez is the protagonist of the movie. He plays the pastor who sees violence in his neighborhood. It is the story of a martyr of our times, Esteban (Moises Reyes), is a retired pastor who comes to the United States to shake hands with his son David (starring Samuel Hernandez) who begins to pastor a new church with his wife Ruth (Nellianne Arce). Esteban is assassinated for preaching the gospel and his son David continues to fight to rescue that community for Christ, since he was terrified by a drug point dominated by Saul (Angel Rosario), no matter risking his life. The plot of "Imitators of Christ" is to project the situations that occurred with Jesus, but in our times. For this reason, the values ​​of love and forgiveness stand out in history.
response.title: The Imitators of Christ
